description: React component for a contact form used on a landing page, allowing users to submit inquiries with instant feedback upon submission.

methods.name: ContactForm
methods.description: React functional component representing a contact form, managing form state and submission status.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Event handler for updating form state when input fields change.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for managing form submission, simulating network response.
